subSections.title: Punctuation mark
subSections.text:
{{ja-punctuation mark}}

# {{lb|ja|now rare}} Ideographic iteration mark, indicating that the previous [[kanji]] should be repeated in vertical writing. The repeated character might not have the same pronunciation as the first due to [[rendaku]].

subSections.title: References
subSections.text: * [http://www.taishukan.co.jp/kanji/qa01.html#Q0009 漢字文化資料館 漢字 Q&A コーナー Q0009 「々」はなんと読むのですか？]
